contentrichtext.text: This is a '''list of [[river]]s in [[Africa]]'''. See each river's article for its tributaries, drainage areas, etc. ==Southern Africa== * [[Cuanza River|Cuanza]] - [[Angola]] * [[Groot River|Groot]]{{dn|date=June 2012}} - [[South Africa]] * [[Ihosy River]] - [[Madagascar]] * [[Kafue River]] - [[Zambia]] * [[Kuiseb River|Kuiseb]] - [[Namibia]] * [[Kunene River|Kunene]] - [[Angola]] <small>''(as [[Cunene River|Cunene]])''</small>, [[Namibia]] * [[Kwando River|Kwando]] - [[Namibia]], also known as ''Linyanti'' and ''Chobe'' in places * [[Limpopo River|Limpopo]] - [[Mozambique]], [[South Africa]], [[Zimbabwe]], [[Botswana]] * [[Luangwa River]] - [[Zambia]] * [[Mania River]] - [[Madagascar]] * [[Molopo River|Molopo]] - [[Botswana]], [[South Africa]] * [[Okavango River|Okavango]] - [[Botswana]], [[Namibia]], [[Angola]] <small>''(as "Cubango")''</small> * [[Onilahy River]] - [[Madagascar]] * [[Orange River|Orange]] - [[South Africa]], [[Lesotho]], [[Namibia]] :* [[Caledon River|Caledon]] - [[South Africa]], [[Lesotho]] :* [[Vaal River|Vaal]] - [[South Africa]] :* [[Fish River, Namibia|Fish]] - [[Namibia]] * [[Shangani River]] - [[Zimbabwe]] * [[Swakop River]] - [[Namibia]] * [[Tugela River|Tugela]] - [[South Africa]] * [[Zambezi]] - [[Angola]], [[Zambia]], [[Namibia]], [[Zimbabwe]], [[Mozambique]] * [[ReVive River]] - [[Zambia]], [[Namibia]], [[Zimbabwe]] ==Central Africa== * [[Chari River|Chari]] - Central African Republic, Chad, Cameroon **[[Logone River|Logone]] - Central African Republic, Chad, Cameroon * [[Congo River|Congo]] - Angola, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Republic of the Congo ** [[Kwango River|Kwango]] - Central African Republic, Chad, Cameroon ** [[Kasai River|Kasai]] - Angola, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Republic of the Congo ** [[Lualaba River|Lualaba]] - Democratic Republic of the Congo ** [[Lomami River|Lomami]] - Democratic Republic of the Congo ** [[Ubangi River|Ubangi]] - Democratic Republic of Congo, Republic of Congo, Central African Republic ** [[Lulonga River|Lulonga]] - Democratic Republic of the Congo ***[[Lopori River|Lopori]] - Democratic Republic of the Congo ***[[Maringa River|Maringa]] - Democratic Republic of the Congo **[[Tshuapa River|Tshuapa]] - Democratic Republic of the Congo * [[Uele River|Uele]] - Democratic Republic of the Congo * [[Mbomou River|Mbomou]] - Central Africa ==East Africa== * [[Awash River|Awash]] - Ethiopia * [[Jubba River|Jubba]] - Somalia ** [[Dawa River|Dawa]] - Ethiopia ** [[Ganale Dorya River]] - Ethiopia * [[Kerio River|Kerio]] - [[Kenya]] * [[Maputo River|Maputo]] - Mozambique * [[Mara River|Mara]] - Kenya, Tanzania * [[Omo River|Omo]] - Ethiopia * [[Rufiji River|Rufiji]] - Tanzania * [[Ruvuma River|Ruvuma]] (Rovuma) - Tanzania, Mozambique * [[Shebelle River|Shebelle]] - Ethiopia, Somalia * [[Tana River (Kenya)|Tana]] - Kenya * [[White Nile]] - Uganda * [[Kazinga Channel]] - Uganda * [[Kagera River]] (Rwanda, Tanzania, Uganda, condum) * [[Sondu Miriu River]] -
